text: Hi Team.  I may not be in the correct thread. Does HubSpot provide canned reports that should be installed in saleforce? It looks like we have a separation on HubSpot marketing and sales items.

My brain immediately goes to the HubSpot API to handle this. You write a script that can make an API call to get all deal properties. Then you can loop through them inserting them in to the new HubSpot account one by one.

Until they create an import button that's the only solution that comes to my head at the moment.
